title: Pokédexjsc
description: A simple web application that displays data about a searched Pokémon (yes, like a Pokédex). To work, it consumes data from the PokeAPI.

title: saladereuniao-app
description: A front-end application created with Vue.js that manages meeting rooms and events. Created during my front-end studies

title: desafio_calculadora
description: A calculator prototype created during a college challenge. Using TDD, HTML, CSS and Typescript.

title: memory-game
description: This is a card game. You can choose two cards at a time and try to find two cards that are exactly the same.
